segments.pli: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, luddho ca, pagabbho ca.
segments.en: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, and lie. And they’re greedy and impudent.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: Someone with these six qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: Someone with six qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, aluddho ca, appagabbho ca.
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, or lie. And they’re not greedy or impudent.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: Someone with these six qualities is raised up to heaven.”
